name: New Years Celebration Circuits
description:
For this game, you have to guide the electrical spark through the wires so that it reaches the end in time for the New Years celebration. To do so, you solve puzzles by sliding around tiles to clear a path before time runs out. Red tiles cannot be moved, blue tiles move along a fixed axis automatically, and green tiles are slid around by grabbing them with the mouse.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Click - interact with tile (if applicable).
  • Hold Left Mouse Click + Mouse Drag - drag around tile (if applicable).
  • Hold [H] - hide tiles.
  • [R] - reset puzzle.
  • [P] - change camera perspective (orthographic and perspective).
  • [SPACE] - attempt to move spark through puzzle.
    • Clicking on one of the yellow gates on the puzzle board also works.

Notes:

  • The game has no audio.
  • The screen edges get cutoff when played in a browser. As such, it's recommended that the game be played in full-screen, which can be done by pressing the full-screen button on the player.
  • Some menu icons are disabled in the HTML5 version.
